item.title: HS Wholesale: Drove an Increase in Online Sales by $79M!
item.description: Problem The client is an online vaping products wholesale supplier. Their industry has difficulty in reaching potential customers because the vaping industry is often blocked from reaching their target market due to the nature of their business.

item.title: Lifetrients: Mastering Global Digital Advertising with Precision and Compliance
item.description: Problem In the competitive realm of the global nutraceutical market, Lifetrients embarked on an ambitious project to expand its digital presence across key markets such as the UK, Brazil, Egypt, China, and Saudi Arabia.

item.title: Stone Gallery: Hyper Local SEO and Reputation Mastery
item.description: Problem Chicago Stone Gallery faced a unique challenge in expanding their reach and bolstering their reputation across multiple locations, including Chicago, Dallas, and Indianapolis.

item.title: Wolf Development: Cutting-Edge Digital Marketing for Standing Out in the Crowded Roofing Market
item.description: Problem Wolf Development faced a significant challenge in distinguishing itself in the highly competitive Chicagoland roofing industry, especially given the saturation of paid digital advertising by numerous competitors.

item.title: Local and National Search Engine Optimization for Leading Waste Management Services Provider
item.description: Problem Despite having an established presence in the recycling industry, this waste management leader struggled with visibility in online search results.
